Text:
Sorry for my ignorance- but after this is complete should I just highlight all the rar files and click "extract here"?

Most torrents are not like this.
^ Yep. This is what you do.

j0nnyboy:
You only need to right-click on the first RAR file, and select 'Extract Here.'
